title: The Latest On Inflation, Omicron, and Fed Tapering
itunes:title: The Latest On Inflation, Omicron, and Fed Tapering
description:
Phil Orlando, Chief Equity Strategist at Federated Hermes, discusses inflation, Fed tapering, and gives his market outlook for 2022. Kevin Nicholson, Global Fixed Income co-CIO, co-Head of Investment Committee from Riverfront Investment Group, talks about equity markets and inflation. Lisa Erickson, Senior Vice President and Co-Head of Public Markets Group at US Bank Wealth Management, offers her market analysis. Dave Hering, COO of Adagio Therapeutics who previously led Pfizer’s vaccine program for North America, talks about the spread of the new Omricon variant. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

itunes:author: Bloomberg
